name: Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons
description: Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons is a single/multiplayer fantasy online experience that can be played locally from your PC (single player offline). Instructions are included on how to host your own server and how other players can join your game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Basic Color Graphics Card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Basic Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Basic Color Graphics Card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Basic Sound Card
